Force transmission and the order parameter of shear thickening

Jun 6, 2019

Romain and I uploaded a manuscript arXiv:1906.02103, discussing shear-thickening order parameters with a force transmission model adapted to shear thickening transitions.

July 25, 2019: Accepted for publication in Soft Matter!!

Computational Soft and Biological Matter group

  • Computational Soft and Biological Matter group
  • seto@ucas.ac.cn

    Our group study soft-matter physics, complex fluid mechanics, and rheology with various computational methods.
